description: I was part of a big team maintaining the two company's websites (Missguided and Mennace) built with Magento, reshaping them with a more up-to-date look and feel, improving their performance, introducing Webpack bundler and React components.
alt: Highly customised, multilanguage Magento eCommerce website

description: Various websites built and maintained for the MAG Airports group using VueJS as a frontend framework and deep diving into its ecosystem. VueX for state management, NuxtJS for server-side rendering, Sass for styling, Webpack as development bundler.
alt: Various websites built and maintained for the MAG Airports group using VueJS as a frontend framework and deep diving into its ecosystem. VueX for state management, NuxtJS for server-side rendering, Sass for styling, Webpack as development bundler.

description: I was part of a big team maintaining the two company's websites (Missguided and Mennace) built with Magento and a Wordpress blog, reshaping them with a more up-to-date look and feel, improving their performance, introducing Webpack bundler and React components.
alt: Highly customised, multilanguage Magento eCommerce website

description: Project developed on Umbraco MVC using HTML, Razor and JAvascript for frontend. Creation of tools in Javascript like product configurator and new carousels
alt: Responsive website made on top of Umbraco cms.

description: Single page website built in HTML, Sass, CSS animations and Vanilla JS . Fully responsive and SEO oriented.
alt: Responsive single page website built from scratch
Responsive website made on top of Umbraco cms.
description: Project developed on Umbraco MVC using HTML, Razor and JAvascript for frontend. Creation of bespoke tools in Javascript like product configurator and new carousels
Project developed on Wordpress using PHP, Javascript and Sass for frontend. Creation of features in Javascript like the Hydration tool, WebGL for weather feedback and animations
alt: Responsive website based on Wordpress and developed from scratch

description: Project developed on pure HTML and CSS with a touch of Javascript. Multi page / multi language website built for a Bed and Breakfast in Venice - Italy
alt: Responsive website built for a Bed&Breakfast in Venice using HTML5, Sass, jQuery, and PHP for the online booking.
